other_title: キャンディ・キャンディ (Japanese)
plot: Candy is a very nice, warm-hearted and cheerful girl. Many people like her or love her because of her kind personality. When she was a little child, she lived in an orphanage. There she met a handsome mysterious boy on a hill behind her home. This "prince on the hill" becomes an important person in her life.... She lived in the orphanage until she is adopted by a very influential big clan. Candy is a very good friend of the teenagers Annie, Archie, Stear and Anthony. Though she and Terence love each other very much, she leaves him because another girl, who is hopelessly in love with him, needs him more. Finally she devotes herself to Albert, a handsome young man and a very good friend of her.
opening_theme: "Candy Candy" (キャンディ キャンディ) by Mitsuko Horie and The Chirps
ending_theme: "Ashita ga Suki" (あしたがすき) by Mitsuko Horie and The Chirps
